segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is barely holding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister looks so excited, waiting for him to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s kind of cute how they’re working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, she doesn’t see any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll be mad when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s not even reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don’t get into too much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, but there’s something funny about it too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how oblivious everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
